Author: ash
Name: Who's Talking
Description:
Once installed, join a Discord voice channel and an XIV party, and have people put their character names in their Discord nicknames. You should get colourful outlines around the job icons on the party list: green for talking, blue for muted, red for deafened, and yellow for unknown name.

Note that you'll get a permission prompt mentioning "StreamKit Overlay" â€“ this is expected.

If stuff breaks, let me know - click Send Feedback (speech bubble icon) below this text.
Punchline: See Discord voice activity indicators directly on your party list.
